price: Kuma Muka aika zuwa ga Mũsã cẽwa ka yi tafiyar dare da bãyiNa, lalle ne kũ waɗanda ake biyã* ne.
arabic: ۞ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِيٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
footnotes: * Mũsa yanã nũna cewa, shi yanã jin tsõro kada ya zama ya gajarta wajen iyar da manzanci, dõmin shi mai saurin fushine, yanã neman a taimake shi ɗan'uwansa Hãrũna.Wannan ya yi kama da farkon sũrar inda Annabi, tshĩra da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi, ya nũna tsõron taƙaitãwa ga iyar da manzancin Allah zuwa ga mutãnensa dõmin haka ba su yi ĩmãni ba. Hãlin Annabawa duka ɗaya ne ga tsõron taƙaita aikin Ubangijinsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā an asri biʿibādī innakum muttabaʿūna
